title: Heart attack
creator_credit: CBS News Production and Imre Horvath
brief_description: America’s number one killer is the heart attack and if you are going to have one, you’re better off having it in Seattle. This is the opening message of this film which shows that it is necessary to deal with a coronary in the first crucial moments.
